selected_skills.name: extract_text_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the ages of the two people from the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to obtain the text from the image, which includes the ages of Person 1 and Person 2.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the age gap between the two people.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to compute the difference between the ages of Person 1 and Person 2.
